mapper.select: select a.id as c_id,c.user_id,b.account,a.`order`,round(a.interest+a.service_fees+a.guarantee_fees,2) as interest,from_unixtime(a.repay_time) as repay_time,a.tender_id,d.hikes_rate from rd_borrow_collection a left join rd_borrow_tender b on a.tender_id=b.id left join rd_user c on b.user_id=c.user_id left join vf_hikes_card_log d on b.id=d.tender_id where b.borrow_id=#{borrowId} and d.id>0 and d.hikes_rate>0
